Text.Page:
They aren't as bad as those horrible dolls, but the monsters down in the Catacomb of Misery and the Bloody Depths are still nothing to sneeze at.

The {@LinkCreature:33#8#merciless}, {@LinkCreature:33#9#armored}, {@LinkCreature:33#58#relentless}, and {@LinkCreature:33#59#pitiless disc reapers} have managed to chase down and kill a number of soldiers and reserachers, despite the fact nothing should move that fast on its hands.

You must eliminate them.

Ah! You truly laugh in the face of death!

Those disc reapers have killed so many, collecting their insignia as trophies! I've fought on the bloodiest battlefields, but nothing makes my blood run cold like this place.
Come on! You can find those disc reapers!
